mapper.select: SELECT IF(usg_type = 550, '서킷데이터', '데이터통화') cdr_kind, 33 cdr_kind_order, DATE_FORMAT(usg_start_date, '%Y/%m/%d') usg_start_date, usg_start_time usg_start_time, total_duration total_duration, '' rat_term_phon_num, '' rat_term_phon_num_xxx, total_usg_nou, total_used_charge, total_rated_charge, (total_used_charge - total_rated_charge) deduct_discount_charge, deduct_code1, deduct_code2, deduct_code3, deduct_code4, deduct_code5, disc_code1, disc_code2, disc_code3, msc_switch_id switch_id, CONCAT(cell_id, ocall_toll_id) AS cell_id, '' tzone, usg_type, CASE WHEN opmd_flag = 7 THEN '스마트와치(AW) 데이터공유' WHEN LENGTH(CH_SVC_ICCID) = 14 THEN CONCAT(substr(ch_svc_iccid, 0, 4), '-', substr(ch_svc_iccid, 5, 4), '-', substr(ch_svc_iccid, 9, 4), '-', substr(ch_svc_iccid, 13)) ELSE IFNULL(CH_SVC_ICCID, '') END bigo_name, ag_service_type_name cont_product_name, network_type, processed_date, processed_time, '' service_term_date, '' service_term_time, usg_seq FROM (SELECT usg_start_date, usg_start_time, total_duration, IF(USG_TYPE = 620, (CASE a.PROD_ID WHEN 'NA00002738' THEN AG_USED_NOU * 1024 WHEN 'NA00002739' THEN AG_USED_NOU * 1024 ELSE AG_USED_NOU * 5 END), ROUND(AG_USED_NOU / 2, 2)) total_usg_nou, total_used_charge, total_rated_charge, deduct_code1, deduct_code2, deduct_code3, deduct_code4, deduct_code5, disc_code1, disc_code2, disc_code3, IFNULL(msc_switch_id, switch_id) msc_switch_id, cell_id, '' sect_cd, usg_type, # b.code_name ag_service_type_name, CAST(usg_seq AS UNSIGNED) usg_seq, CH_SVC_ICCID, ocall_toll_id, processed_date, processed_time, org_net_info, (CASE org_net_info WHEN '4' THEN 'LTE' WHEN '5' THEN 'LTE(3G망)' WHEN 'D' THEN '3G(LTE망)' WHEN 'I' THEN '5G' WHEN 'H' THEN '5G(LTE망)' ELSE '' END) as network_type, opmd_flag, dialed_no, called_no from ONLINE_EVDO_RATED_CDR_TEMP a RIGHT OUTER JOIN ui_minor_code b on a.ag_service_type = b.code_id WHERE service_mgmt_no = #{service_mgmt_no} AND usg_start_date >= '20200400' AND usg_start_date <= '20200501' # AND concat(usg_start_date, usg_start_time) >= '202004010000000' AND concat(usg_start_date, usg_start_time) >= #{startDate} AND concat(usg_start_date, usg_start_time) <= #{endDate} AND b.major_id = 'EVDO_AG_SERVICE_TYPE' AND IFNULL(a.AG_SERVICE_TYPE, ' ') <> 'MVP') as ab;

select.foreach: SELECT IF(usg_type = 550, '서킷데이터', '데이터통화') cdr_kind, 33 cdr_kind_order, DATE_FORMAT(usg_start_date, '%Y/%m/%d') usg_start_date, usg_start_time usg_start_time, total_duration total_duration, '' rat_term_phon_num, '' rat_term_phon_num_xxx, total_usg_nou, total_used_charge, total_rated_charge, (total_used_charge - total_rated_charge) deduct_discount_charge, deduct_code1, deduct_code2, deduct_code3, deduct_code4, deduct_code5, disc_code1, disc_code2, disc_code3, msc_switch_id switch_id, CONCAT(cell_id, ocall_toll_id) AS cell_id, '' tzone, usg_type, CASE WHEN opmd_flag = 7 THEN '스마트와치(AW) 데이터공유' WHEN LENGTH(CH_SVC_ICCID) = 14 THEN CONCAT(substr(ch_svc_iccid, 0, 4), '-', substr(ch_svc_iccid, 5, 4), '-', substr(ch_svc_iccid, 9, 4), '-', substr(ch_svc_iccid, 13)) ELSE IFNULL(CH_SVC_ICCID, '') END bigo_name, ag_service_type_name cont_product_name, network_type, processed_date, processed_time, '' service_term_date, '' service_term_time, usg_seq FROM (SELECT usg_start_date, usg_start_time, total_duration, IF(USG_TYPE = 620, (CASE a.PROD_ID WHEN 'NA00002738' THEN AG_USED_NOU * 1024 WHEN 'NA00002739' THEN AG_USED_NOU * 1024 ELSE AG_USED_NOU * 5 END), ROUND(AG_USED_NOU / 2, 2)) total_usg_nou, total_used_charge, total_rated_charge, deduct_code1, deduct_code2, deduct_code3, deduct_code4, deduct_code5, disc_code1, disc_code2, disc_code3, IFNULL(msc_switch_id, switch_id) msc_switch_id, cell_id, '' sect_cd, usg_type, b.code_name ag_service_type_name, CAST(usg_seq AS UNSIGNED) usg_seq, CH_SVC_ICCID, ocall_toll_id, processed_date, processed_time, org_net_info, (CASE org_net_info WHEN '4' THEN 'LTE' WHEN '5' THEN 'LTE(3G망)' WHEN 'D' THEN '3G(LTE망)' WHEN 'I' THEN '5G' WHEN 'H' THEN '5G(LTE망)' ELSE '' END) as network_type, opmd_flag, dialed_no, called_no from ${table} a RIGHT OUTER JOIN ui_minor_code b on a.ag_service_type = b.code_id WHERE service_mgmt_no = #{service_mgmt_no} AND usg_start_date >= #{startDate} AND usg_start_date <= #{endDate} AND concat(usg_start_date, usg_start_time) >= #{startDateTime} AND concat(usg_start_date, usg_start_time) <= #{endDateTime} AND b.major_id = 'EVDO_AG_SERVICE_TYPE' AND IFNULL(a.AG_SERVICE_TYPE, ' ') <> 'MVP') as a

mapper.insert: insert into ONLINE_EVDO_RATED_CDR_TEMP (NODE_NO, SERVICE_MGMT_NO, USG_START_DATE, USG_START_TIME, USG_TYPE, USG_SEQ, TIME_FLAG, EXTRNID, EXTRNID_TYPE, PROD_ID, CORRIDOR_ID, WIN_SVC, CHARGE_CODE, SERVICE_FEATURE, FILENAME, FILEROW, CALLED_NO, DIALED_NO, DAY_TYPE_CD, SERVICE_TERM_DATE, SERVICE_TERM_TIME, TOTAL_DURATION, TOTAL_VOLUME, TOTAL_FREE_VOLUME, TOTAL_USG_NOU, TOTAL_FREE_USG_NOU, Q_CODE, QOS, SERVICE_TYPE_CD, TRANS_COUNT, CHARGE_OR_NOT, PPS_CARD_TYPE, TOTAL_USED_CHARGE, TOTAL_RATED_CHARGE, CARRIER, ORG_NET_INFO, NPA, MSC_SWITCH_ID, SWITCH_ID, CELL_ID, CALL_STATUS, CP_CODE, ISP_CODE, IP_CODE, MSG_LENGTH, BILLCYCLE_ID, EXTRA_RATING_FAC, DEDUCT_CODE1, DEDUCTED_CHARGE1, DEDUCT_BAL_BEFORE1, DEDUCT_BAL_AFTER1, SUB_EVENT_CD1, DEDUCT_CODE2, DEDUCTED_CHARGE2, DEDUCT_BAL_BEFORE2, DEDUCT_BAL_AFTER2, SUB_EVENT_CD2, DEDUCT_CODE3, DEDUCTED_CHARGE3, DEDUCT_BAL_BEFORE3, DEDUCT_BAL_AFTER3, SUB_EVENT_CD3, DEDUCT_CODE4, DEDUCTED_CHARGE4, DEDUCT_BAL_BEFORE4, DEDUCT_BAL_AFTER4, SUB_EVENT_CD4, DEDUCT_CODE5, DEDUCTED_CHARGE5, DEDUCT_BAL_BEFORE5, DEDUCT_BAL_AFTER5, SUB_EVENT_CD5, DISC_CODE1, DISC_CHARGE1, DISC_CODE2, DISC_CHARGE2, DISC_CODE3, DISC_CHARGE3, LIMIT_CODE, LIMIT_APPLIED_CHARGE, LIMIT_BAL_BEFORE, LIMIT_BAL_AFTER, LIMIT_APPLIED_TYPE, AG_SERVICE_TYPE, AG_USED_NOU, AG_FREE_USED_NOU, AG_USED_CHARGE, AG_FREE_USED_CHARGE, CDR_DURATION, CH_SERVICE_MGMT_NO, CH_SVC_ICCID, OPMD_FLAG, DBM_PROD_ID, ZONE_CALL_INFO, OCALL_TOLL_ID, PROD_SEQ, PROCESSED_DATE, PROCESSED_TIME, CHARGING_ID, PPE, SVC_QOS_UL, SVC_QOS_DL, LOS_SEQ_NO, SESSION_STATUS, NTW_SLICE_ID, SVC_GRP) values (2, #{service_mgmt_no}, 20210501, 001437, 650, 1, 1, 01040000018, 1, 'NA00001595', NULL, 85, 'LL013', 'LTE', 'ONLINE_EVDO_RATED_CDR_0501_2_0.txt', 10162, NULL, NULL, NULL, 20210501, 001437, 8466400, 557122914, 1414771015, 484649627, 5339494, NULL, NULL, 1, 0, 'B', 0, 721235.50, 20620408.22, NULL, 4, 11, 'STVk', 'bL4m', 'kyzM', 0, 280000, 0, 0, 499276497, 1, NULL, 'fiRrv', 3302535.89, 6799809.24, 15826434.79, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 14795615.14, NULL, 8343361.81, NULL, 19144712.29, NULL, NULL, 2094896.04, 19055180.64, NULL, 'ETC', 656927877, 3116322, 10775525.29, 13461230.51, 7939585, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'NA00001595', 0, 'IRS', 0, 20210501, 001437, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL, NULL);
